collectible.title: Big Toblerone
collectible.subtitle: A bar of luxury Swiss chocolate. It's really big.
collectible.text: It's a bar of chocolate Kaz gave you for winning a round of poker. It's bigger than any chocolate bar you've ever seen, let alone held. Just thinkin about eating it is giving you a stomach ache. Maybe you'd better share it.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Kaz Kaan.
